= Demo Prep Form =

== Business Value ==
What is their business value?
what do they hope to achieve?
What is the desired result?

== Key Points ==
What questions need to be answered?
What capabilities do they need to see?
What specific concerns need to be addressed?
What's the top priority of key points?

== Sensitive Topics ==
Are there sensitive topics?
Is there any impact on tangent deals?

== Alternative Solutions ==
What are the customer's alternative options?
What are the known traps and responses?
How do you plan to address/defend?

== Attendees ==
What are the attendees roles and responisibilites?
have the stakeholders changed?
can we link to the paint points and needs of each?
